Thanks for the pointer, but I thought that the whole point of MPI was that =
it was a virtually shared memory model for a compute cluster.  I don't have=
 access to a cluster, so I quickly ruled out MPI as a mechanism for doing t=
his.  Maybe I need to read up a bit more on it.

Thanks again!

-- Chris
